import gql from 'graphql-tag';
export const FETCH_INSURANCE_COMP = gql`
query getInsuranceCompany {
  insuranceCompanies(limit:30)
  {
    count
    pages
    hasNext
    hasPrev
    items
    {
    id
    email
    name
    isActive
    mobileNumber
    telephoneNumber
    physicalAddress
    imageUrl
    postalAddress
    contactPerson
    }}}
`;
export const CREATE_MOTOR_POLICY = gql`mutation createMotorPolicy(
  $policyNo: String!
  $individualClient: String!
  $insuranceCompany: String!
  $transactionType: String!
  $transactionDate: Date!
  $startDate: Date!
  $endDate: Date!
  $renewalDate: Date
  $premiumType: String!
  $insuranceClass: String!
  $remarks: String
  $policyCommissionRate:Float!
  $withholdingTax:Float!
  $commissionRate: Float!
  $minimumPremiumAmount: Float!
  $additionalBenefits:[AdditionalBenefitInput]
  $additionalPremiums:[AdditionalPremiumInput]
  $vehicles:[VehicleInput]
) {
  createMotorPolicy(input:{
    policyNo: $policyNo
    individualClient: $individualClient
    transactionDate: $transactionDate
    insuranceCompany:$insuranceCompany
    startDate: $startDate
    endDate: $endDate
    renewalDate: $renewalDate
    minimumPremiumAmount:$minimumPremiumAmount
    insuranceClass: $insuranceClass
    transactionType: $transactionType
    remarks:$remarks
    commissionRate: $commissionRate
    premiumType: $premiumType
    policyCommissionRate: $policyCommissionRate
    withholdingTax: $withholdingTax
    additionalBenefits: $additionalBenefits
    additionalPremiums:$additionalPremiums

    vehicles: $vehicles
  }){
    status
    message
     motorPolicy{
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        debitNoteNo
        policyNo
        transactionDate
        premiumType
        policyCommissionRate
        withholdingTax
        remarks
        additionalBenefits{
          id
          benefit
          commissionRate
        }
        insuranceClass
        startDate
        endDate
        renewalDate
        transactionType
        value
        vehicles{
          id
          createdAt
          registrationNo
          yearOfManufacture
          tonnage
          value
          body
        }
        individualClient{
          deletedAt
          id
          firstName
          lastName
          email
        }
        agency{
          id
          createdAt
          updatedAt
          name
          boxNumber
        }
      insuranceCompany{
        id
        name
        contactPerson
        physicalAddress
      }
    }}}`;

export const DELETE_ADDITIONAL_PREM = gql`

    status

sourcesContent:
import gql from 'graphql-tag';

export const FETCH_INSURANCE_COMP = gql`
query getInsuranceCompany {
  insuranceCompanies(limit:30)
  {
    count
    pages
    hasNext
    hasPrev
    items
    {
    id
    email
    name
    isActive
    mobileNumber
    telephoneNumber
    physicalAddress
    imageUrl
    postalAddress
    contactPerson
    }}}
`
export const CREATE_MOTOR_POLICY = gql`mutation createMotorPolicy(
  $policyNo: String!
  $individualClient: String!
  $insuranceCompany: String!
  $transactionType: String!
  $transactionDate: Date!
  $startDate: Date!
  $endDate: Date!
  $renewalDate: Date
  $premiumType: String!
  $insuranceClass: String!
  $remarks: String
  $policyCommissionRate:Float!
  $withholdingTax:Float!
  $commissionRate: Float!
  $minimumPremiumAmount: Float!
  $additionalBenefits:[AdditionalBenefitInput]
  $additionalPremiums:[AdditionalPremiumInput]
  $vehicles:[VehicleInput]
) {
  createMotorPolicy(input:{
    policyNo: $policyNo
    individualClient: $individualClient
    transactionDate: $transactionDate
    insuranceCompany:$insuranceCompany
    startDate: $startDate
    endDate: $endDate
    renewalDate: $renewalDate
    minimumPremiumAmount:$minimumPremiumAmount
    insuranceClass: $insuranceClass
    transactionType: $transactionType
    remarks:$remarks
    commissionRate: $commissionRate
    premiumType: $premiumType
    policyCommissionRate: $policyCommissionRate
    withholdingTax: $withholdingTax
    additionalBenefits: $additionalBenefits
    additionalPremiums:$additionalPremiums

    vehicles: $vehicles
  }){
    status
    message
     motorPolicy{
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        debitNoteNo
        policyNo
        transactionDate
        premiumType
        policyCommissionRate
        withholdingTax
        remarks
        additionalBenefits{
          id
          benefit
          commissionRate
        }
        insuranceClass
        startDate
        endDate
        renewalDate
        transactionType
        value
        vehicles{
          id
          createdAt
          registrationNo
          yearOfManufacture
          tonnage
          value
          body
        }
        individualClient{
          deletedAt
          id
          firstName
          lastName
          email
        }
        agency{
          id
          createdAt
          updatedAt
          name
          boxNumber
        }
      insuranceCompany{
        id
        name
        contactPerson
        physicalAddress
      }
    }}}`

export const UPDATE_MOTOR_POLICY = gql`mutation updateMotorPolicy($id:String!
  $debitNoteNo: String
  $policyNo: String
  $individualClient: String
  $insuranceCompany: String
  $transactionType: String
  $transactionDate: Date
  $startDate: Date
  $endDate: Date
  $renewalDate: Date
  $premiumType: String
  $insuranceClass: String
  $remarks: String
  $commissionRate: Float
  $minimumPremiumAmount: Float
  $value: Float
  $vehicles:[VehicleInput]
  $additionalBenefits:[AdditionalBenefitInput]
  $additionalPremiums:[AdditionalPremiumInput]
) {
  updateMotorPolicy(
    id: $id,
    input:{
    debitNoteNo: $debitNoteNo
    policyNo: $policyNo
    individualClient: $individualClient
    transactionDate: $transactionDate
    insuranceCompany:$insuranceCompany
    startDate: $startDate
    endDate: $endDate
    renewalDate: $renewalDate
    minimumPremiumAmount:$minimumPremiumAmount
    value: $value
    insuranceClass: $insuranceClass
    transactionType: $transactionType
    remarks:$remarks
    commissionRate: $commissionRate
    premiumType: $premiumType
    additionalBenefits: $additionalBenefits
    additionalPremiums:$additionalPremiums

    vehicles: $vehicles
  }){
    status
    message
     motorPolicy{
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        debitNoteNo
        policyNo
        transactionDate
        premiumType
        remarks
        additionalBenefits{
          id
          benefit
          commissionRate
        }
        insuranceClass
        startDate
        endDate
        renewalDate
        transactionType
        value
        vehicles{
          id
          createdAt
          registrationNo
          yearOfManufacture
          tonnage
          value
          body
        }
        individualClient{
          deletedAt
          id
          firstName
          lastName
          email
        }
        agency{
          id
          createdAt
          updatedAt
          name
          boxNumber
        }
      insuranceCompany{
        id
        name
        contactPerson
        physicalAddress
      }
    }}}`
export const GET_MOTOR_POLICY_OPTS = gql`
query getMotorPolicyOptions {
  motorPolicyOptions}`
export const FETCH_MOTOR_POLICIES = gql`
query getMotorPolicies($search:String,$page:Int, $limit:Int) {
  motorPolicies(limit:$limit,page:$page, search:$search)
  {
    count
    pages
    hasNext
    page
    hasPrev
    items
    {
      id
      createdAt
      debitNoteNo
      policyNo
      premiums
      transactionDate
      premiumType
      additionalBenefits{
        benefit
        commissionRate
        minimumAmount
      }
      insuranceClass
      startDate
      endDate
      renewalDate
      transactionType
      additionalPremiums{
        premium
        commissionRate
        minimumAmount
      }
      vehicles{
        registrationNo
        yearOfManufacture
        tonnage
        body
      }
      individualClient{
        id
        firstName
        lastName
        email
      }
      agency{
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        name
        boxNumber
      }
    insuranceCompany{
      id
      name
      contactPerson
      physicalAddress
    }
    }
  }}`
export const FETCH_MINIMAL_MOTOR_POLICIES = gql`
query getMotorPolicies($search:String,$page:Int, $limit:Int) {
  motorPolicies(limit:$limit,page:$page, search:$search)
  {
    count
    pages
    hasNext
    page
    hasPrev
    items
    {
      policyNo
      individualClient{
        firstName
        lastName
        email
      }
    }
  }}`

export const DELETE_ADDITIONAL_BEN = gql`
mutation deleteAdditionalBenefit($id:[String]!) {
  deleteAdditionalBenefit(id:$id){
    status
    message
    }}`
export const DELETE_ADDITIONAL_PREM = gql`
mutation deleteAdditionalPremium($id:[String]!) {
  deleteAdditionalPremium(id:$id){
    status
    message
    }}`

export const GET_MOTOR_POLICY = gql`
query getMotorPolicy($id:String!) {
    motorPolicy(id:$id)
    {

        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        debitNoteNo
        policyNo
        transactionDate
        transactionType
        premiumType
        insuranceClass
        premiums
        commissionRate
        remarks
        policyCommissionRate
        withholdingTax
        minimumPremiumAmount
        additionalBenefits{
          benefit
          commissionRate
          minimumAmount
          label
          id
        }
        additionalPremiums{
          premium
          label
          commissionRate
          minimumAmount
          id
        }
        insuranceClass
        startDate
        endDate
        renewalDate
        transactionType
        value
        vehicles{
          id
          createdAt
          registrationNo
          yearOfManufacture
          tonnage
          body
          make
          model
          tonnage
          cc
          seatingCapacity
          engineNo
          chassisNo
          color
          value
        }
        individualClient{
          deletedAt
          id
          firstName
          lastName
          email
          kraPin
          phoneNumber
          postalAddress
          surname
          idNumber
          occupation
          town
        }
        agency{
          id
          createdAt
          updatedAt
          name
          boxNumber
        }
      insuranceCompany{
        id
        name
        contactPerson
        physicalAddress
      }
    }}`
